Pre-Game Insights: India has a strong Net Run Rate (NRR) of 2.425, and a win against Australia will confirm their spot in the semis.
Australia's NRR dropped from 2.47 to 0.22 after losing to Afghanistan, putting them under pressure.
Afghanistan's win over Australia affects the qualification chances of India, Australia, and Bangladesh.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match outcome will significantly impact the qualification chances of India and Australia.
Bangladesh's slim chance of qualification depends on a massive win against Afghanistan.
